short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's a site alert. It inserts a custom alert / warning on the page based on keyword in the URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was created to place a custom alert on the page based on the URL. A site alert. The developer's goal was to differentiate a production environment from a development one, but it can be used according to your creativity.
